name: Daniel Șerbu
title: Penetration Tester & Security Researcher
summary: Offensive security specialist with 3+ years of experience in penetration testing and cybersecurity. Expert in identifying and exploiting vulnerabilities across web applications, APIs, cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure, GCP), mobile applications, and Active Directory environments. Proven track record in delivering comprehensive security assessments, developing red team tools, and conducting secure code reviews. Strong foundation in DevSecOps practices with experience in CI/CD security integration, SAST/DAST implementation, and secure-by-design development. Published 12+ technical writeups and maintain curated security resources for the community. Passionate about continuous learning and staying ahead of emerging threats in the cybersecurity landscape.

experience.title: Penetration Tester
responsibilities: Conduct comprehensive security assessments across web/mobile applications, APIs, and cloud systems (AWS, Azure, GCP)
Perform external reconnaissance, OSINT investigations, exploitation, and lateral movement testing
Develop custom red team tools and automation scripts to enhance testing efficiency
Execute secure code reviews identifying critical vulnerabilities before production deployment
Prepare detailed vulnerability reports with prioritized remediation guidance and executive summaries
Specialize in OWASP Top 10, business logic flaws, authentication bypasses, and cloud misconfigurations

experience.title: DevOps & Test Automation Engineer
responsibilities: Automated CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, Atlassian Bamboo, and Visual Studio AppCenter
Implemented ship software security controls and vulnerability scanning in deployment pipelines
Designed and executed comprehensive API testing strategies using Postman, Newman, and JMeter
Integrated security testing tools (SonarQube, MobSF) into development workflows
Mentored development teams on security best practices and test automation frameworks
Created technical documentation and training materials for secure development lifecycle

experience.title: Software QA Test Engineer
responsibilities: Designed comprehensive test suites for server/client/mobile applications ensuring security and quality
Administered and monitored CI/CD infrastructure maintaining high availability and security
Developed test automation frameworks using Postman, JMeter, Robot Framework, and Xamarin UI Test
Performed security-focused testing identifying vulnerabilities in early development stages
Collaborated with development teams to implement security controls and vulnerability fixes
